content.text: Kotlin Syllabus
Introduction
The W3Schools Kotlin Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.
content.html: The W3Schools Kotlin Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.

content.text: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of Kotlin programming.
content.html: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of Kotlin programming.

content.text: It is designed for beginners and requires no prior programming experience.
content.html: It is designed for beginners and requires no prior programming experience.

content.text: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.

content.text: Kotlin Certification
W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.

content.text: Here you can take exams to get certified.

content.text: The Kotlin exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools Kotlin syllabus.
content.html: The Kotlin exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools Kotlin syllabus.

content.text: After passing the exam you get the "Certified Kotlin Developer" Certification.
content.html: After passing the exam you get the "Certified Kotlin Developer" Certification.

content.text: There are two different types of certifications:

content.text: The non-adaptive is pass or no pass.
content.html: The non-adaptive is pass or no pass.

content.text: The adaptive certification is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.
